title: "Telenor announces Scribe speech recognition scheme to analyse Norwegian language"
excerpt: "Telenor has announced the 'Scribe' automatic speech recognition (ASR) project in conjunction with other partners. Such technology does not yet exist for the highly dialectical Norwegian language, it said."
